comments.body: @smarterclayton is there any specific reason we didn't handle not found on etcd update?

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +70,74 @@	case storage.IsUnreachable(err):
		return errors.NewServerTimeout(qualifiedResource, "update", 2) // TODO: make configurable or handled at a higher level
	case storage.IsNotFound(err):
		return errors.NewNotFound(qualifiedResource, name)
	default:
